meanings.definition: The act of terminating something in advance.
meanings.sent1: The pretermination of the project saved us time and resources.
meanings.sent2: The pretermination of the contract was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: His pretermination of the game made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The pretermination of the relationship left a void in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The pretermination of the flight was announced over the loudspeaker.

meanings.definition: The state of being terminated in advance.
meanings.sent1: The pretermination of the service disrupted our plans.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by the pretermination of her membership.
meanings.sent3: The pretermination of the party left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The pretermination of the lease felt like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The pretermination of the program was met with confusion.
